So…what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Pick one: colorful shoes or a colorful sweater?

Let’s go with the colorful shoes. Life is too short for boring footwear!

2. Which would you rather never have to deal with again: nosy neighbors, parallel parking, burnt food or washing your makeup brushes?

Once, I caught a neighbor going through our trash. So I could do without the nosy neighbors, LOL!

3. Have you ever crimped your hair?

Yes, but sadly, I never got to do it in the ‘80s (I was too young and missed all the cool stuff).

4. Who does the grocery shopping in your household?

Mostly me, but El Hub will do it if he has extra time and/or if I’m busy with Connor doing extracurriculars.

5. Liquid liner: yes or no?

One hundred percent yes! Ideally it’s a pen with a flexible fine tip.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

4. Who does the grocery shopping in your household?
